alert.note: Alert for Alger (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 11:35AM EST until February 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, greatest west of Munising. * WHERE...Alger County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall will arrive between 4 PM and 5 PM EST and will continue through 10 PM EST this evening. During that period, snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will occur at times, making travel especially difficult. Northerly winds will become gusty up to 35 mph tonight, creating blowing snow and sharply reduced visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
